Headline: #22 Clark Temporary Reroute at
ShortDescription: 22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted via Clark, Addison, Racine, Diversey & Clark due to street blockage near Clark/Belmont.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Clark, Addison, Racine, Diversey, then resume their normal route on Clark due to street blockage near Clark/Belmont.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #53 Pulaski Temporary Reroute near Pulaski/Van Buren
ShortDescription: #53 NB via Pulaski, Jackson, Independence, Congress/Pilaski; SB via Pulaski, Harrison, Independence, Jackson/Pulaski, due to CPD activity nr Pulaski/Van Buren

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#53 Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to police activity near Pulaski/Van Buren.

Northbound buses will operate via Pulaski, Jackson, Independence, Congress, then resume their normal route on Pulaski.

Southbound buses will operate via Pulaski, Harrison, Independence, Jackson, then resume their normal route on Pulaski.

Allow extra travel time.
